snippet: As part of a criminal complaint filed in court on Thursday, federal investigators detailed how the onetime KPMG executive, Scott I. London, improperly shared confidential information about Herbalife’s earnings.
abstract: As part of a criminal complaint filed in court on Thursday, federal investigators detailed how the onetime KPMG executive, Scott I. London, improperly shared confidential information about Herbalife’s earnings.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: How Herbalife Was Drawn Into KPMG Insider Trading Inquiry
